bronze:FreeFunctionsPotion.NAME: Machine Oil
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the cost of Functions in your hand by

bronze:CleanCodePotion.NAME: Alchyrical Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove all negative Compile effects from the next Function you Compile.  Reduce its cost to 0 until played.
Remove all negative Compile effects from the next 2 Functions you Compile.  Reduce their cost to 0 until played.

bronze:BurnAndBuffPotion.NAME: Vexing Draught
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity. NL Add two Burn+ Status cards to your draw pile.

bronze:BuildAFunctionPotion.NAME: Kio's Clever Concoction
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose 1 of 3 cards with Encode, three times. Compile a Function using those cards and add it to your hand.
Choose 1 of 3 cards with Encode, three times. Compile a Function using those cards and add two copies of it to your hand.
